name: Refrigerator
description:
My client is a widow (her husband passed away in April due to a heart attack) and since then, she has to singlehandedly take care of her 2 very young children (aged 5 and 2 years old respectively) while still grieving from the death of her husband. 

She has just received the keys to her rental flat and has shifted into it . However, as she has not found employment yet (she has started to send out resumes after slowing recovering from the grieving of her husband), she is unable to afford the more expensive household items such as fridge, washing machine etc.

My client informed me earlier today that her aunt has kindly donated a washing machine to her. Hence, she just needs a fridge now. The fridge is important since she can cook at home (instead of eating outside) using the frozen groceries and hence can save some money. She can also use the fridge to store the unfinished / leftover food and heat them for consumption the next day. This will again help her to save money on her food expenses. Those more easily perishable items such as milk (for her children), cheese etc can also be stored in the fridge as well. 

Besides the savings on food expenses, my client children can also be spared from eating outside regularly which might not be the healthier option for them. By cooking at home, my client can control the oil and other ingredients and will be able to cook less oily and more nutritious food for them.          

In view of the above, I hope that any kind donor can help to secure a fridge for my client. My client is a resilient client, and her situation can be improved once she has secured a job. However, in the interim, she will need the kind assistance of PassITOn donors so that she can secure a fridge and thereby save some money (especially on the food expenses). 

Sorry for the long appeal message and await your positive reply on helping my widowed client and her 2 children. Thanks!

Regards
Mr Ho (9722 2721)

description:

Due to her limited financial resources, she is unable to afford adult diapers, which are essential for her mother’s daily care.

We are specifically looking for donations of Adult Diapers, Size L (Pull-Up Type only) – any brand is appreciated. Please note that we are not accepting tape-on/clip-on diapers at this time.

If you or someone you know would like to donate or have supplies to give, please feel free to contact me via WhatsApp at +65 9127 8766.

Your support will go a long way in easing the caregiving burden on my client and improving the quality of life for her mother. Thank you for your kindness and generosity!

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones or Earbuds
description:
We’re supporting an elderly lady in her 80s who’s been struggling with constant knocking noises from her upstairs neighbour. The sounds have been disturbing her sleep and disrupting her quiet moments of prayer — two things she holds dearly.

While we’re currently assisting her with the ongoing noise complaints, what she truly longs for is just a bit of peace — to be able to rest and pray without fear or frustration.

If anyone is able to donate a pair of noise-cancelling headphones, it would mean the world to her, and bring her some much-needed comfort during this difficult time.

However, the mother, being the sole breadwinner, is unable to afford it due to financial constraints. This supplement supports brain function, focus, and overall health, which is vital for the children's development and academic progress. Client is unfit for employment due to his mental health condition. 

His previous bicycle is spoilt and seeking for donated bicycle to allow client to travel and helps him improve his health condition.

Requesting for a bicycle so he can ride for travelling and mental health purposes. Kind donors please whatsapp me at 98994651. Thank you so much in advance.

name: Walking Pad (With handlebar)
description: Member is a foreigner lady who is currently facing major mobility issues due to spinal surgery last year. She lives in a 1 room rental flat with her husband who is working full time to clear off his debts. She is currently requiring a walking pad with handlebar to practice walking at home so that she can regain mobility.

name: Smartphone with SIM Card
description: Client is the sole caregiver for her 4 young children age 9, 8, 7 and 5 due to family violence concerns. Client is struggling to find a job to accommodate her caregiving duties so she is currently unemployed and reliant on formal systems of support. As her smartphone was broken during an altercation with her husband, she would like to receive a new smartphone with SIM card.

name: Art Books
description: Client, F/27, is single and unemployed. She was unable to finish her studies due to personal struggles and challenges in interacting with others. However, she is interested in the arts, including drawing, photography and cinematography, and hopes to improve herself with the eventual aim of returning to society through work and studies. Due to poor family relationships, she is unable to depend on them. She will benefit from resources such as books on art, photography or cinematography to help her develop her skills and interests and eventually work towards confidence and independence as an adult.

name: Treadmill
description: Centre for Adults with Autism is seeking a donated treadmill for our clients' fitness programme. Require treadmill that can hold weight up to 180kg.

name: Mountain Bicycle Request
description: Client who suffers from prolapsed intervertebral disc is greatly affected and is unfit for employment as she cannot stand under prolonged hours, carry heavy items or too strenuous work. The worse that could happen as told by her doctor would be paralysis. However, she is motivated and have been riding son's spoilt bicycle for a few hours a day to do food delivery just to be able to earn some money to buy something for her young children. Requesting for a proper mountain bicycle so she can ride uphill for delivery purposes. Kind donors please whatsapp me at 87744703. Thank you so much in advance.

description: *Interested donors please WHATSAPP 96183516/ OR EMAIL to liaise.* Elderly client living alone with no income (Husband passed away end 2024, her 2 sons is taking turn to care for her however they also have their own family and are financially tight). Caseworker is looking for some Anlene milk (plain flavor) to support client health. Thank you!

name: Motorised Wheelchair with Attendant Control
description:
61-year-old senior stays with his LTVP-holder wife and a 11-year-old son with autism. Senior has multiple health conditions and is medically unfit for work. As such, wife has to take care of both client and their son and family is solely reliant on financial payouts for their living expenses. Senior requires a new motorized wheelchair with attendant control for wife to assist him as he is unable to walk safely alone due to his poor eyesight and gait.

Family can only afford to co-pay a portion of the cost, and there remains an outstanding amount of $450 even after subsidies.

If keen to donate, please kindly contact/ WhatsApp Ms. Lin at 9846 7229. Your help is greatly appreciated, thank you!

name: 4-wheeled walker with brakes
description: Senior in need of a 4-wheeled walker with brakes.

name: Wheelchair (ViN 31A - Travel Pushchair)
description: Client requested for a specific wheelchair for mum, 71 years-old. Mum was diagnosed with stroke some years back, and since then, has been unable to travel far. Family is concerned about mum feeling socially isolated and believes that a wheelchair would encourage their mum to join for outdoor activities again. Client specifically requested for the wheelchair in the photo as the family consists of teenagers and women; they may struggle with heavier wheelchairs.

name: Motorized wheelchair or PMD
description: Middle aged male is in need of a motorized wheelchair or PMD for ambulating in the community. He recently had amputated his left leg, from the knee and below due to his diabetes. As such, he lost his job and source of income while being unable to ambulate as easily in the community. He is currently using a manual wheelchair where he uses his right leg to drag himself, however, this arrangement is very tiring and unsustainable. He remains wanting to be independent, going to medical appointments by himself using the manual wheelchair. A motorized wheelchair would strongly enable his desire and attempts at independence.

name: Mobility scooter
description: An elderly caregiver underwent surgery recently to amputate her toes due to diabetes and is unable to walk for prolonged periods of time. She has to provide caregiving to her grandson while her husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. The mobility scooter will bring more convenience when she has to fetch her grandson to and fro school, and on days when she needs to buy food or necessities. The support will greatly improve her quality of life. Do reach out to Marilyn at 81214654 for further clarifications. Thank you!

name: Induction pots
description: A family of 4 who are living in a 2-room rental flat is faced with financial difficulties as child's mother is recently released from prison and is providing full-time caregiving to her grandmother who has stroke. She hopes to receive support through the purchase of induction pots and pans. For further clarifications, please contact Marilyn at 8121 4654 or marilyn@newlifestories.org.sg. Thank you!

name: Double Table Top Burner (Gas Cooker)
description: We are supporting a single mother who is currently residing in a public rental flat with her 15-year-old daughter. The mother is unemployed and has been struggling with emotional distress and depression over the years, particularly after the passing of her parents. She continues to face challenges in adjusting and stabilising her life. At present, she lacks several essential household appliances, which affects her daily functioning and well-being. We are hoping to seek community support to help meet her immediate needs.
